__TOC__

=== Who uses the fridge? ===

Here we define who the target users of the fridge are and how we can best serve each. During an IRC meeting in #ubuntu-website on Dec 17th 2008 nand, boredandblogging and newz2000 created this information.

* locos - want to know what other locos are doing
* insiders - trying to stay in touch with what's going on
* outsiders / press - looking for use cases or success stories about Ubuntu

Not a target audience:

* People who don't know what Ubuntu is

==== Locos ====

Interested in:

* Events
* Bug jams
* Free culture showcase
* Open week

Turned off by:

* Too much technical stuff
* Low level techincal discussions or topics

==== Insiders ====

Interested in:

* MOTU
* Docs
* Testing
* News from their own team

Turned off by:

* newbie stuff (not an issue with typical fare, but maybe user submitted content would introduce this)

==== Outsiders ====

Interested in:

* What's going on in Ubuntu
* News about upstream, xorg, kernel, ati hardware support, gnome info

Turned off by:

* Having to join a mailing list or IRC
* Having to look upstream
